name: Dive N" CRAFT
description:
Dive N" CRAFT is here!

It’s the overhaul of a generation. Download it now and see for yourself!

This is a 3D game about placing blocks and going on adventures.

Pocket Edition includes Survival and Creative modes, multiplayer over a local Wi-Fi network, infinite worlds, caves, new biomes, mobs, villages and lots more. Craft, create and explore anywhere in the world so long as you have hands spare and battery to burn.

There’s never been a better time to enjoy Sky Diving Craft on the move.

Great for all ages!
